# Islander Studio

> Islander Studio is an independent iOS app development studio creating beautifully designed apps that blend artistry with functionality.

## About

Islander Studio is a boutique app studio founded in 2024, focused on crafting thoughtful iOS applications. We believe in privacy-first design, beautiful interfaces, and apps that respect users' time and attention.

## Apps

### Shellist
- **Category**: Habit Tracker
- **Platform**: iOS 17.0+
- **Price**: $2.99 (one-time purchase)
- **App Store**: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/shellist/id6755242144
- **Description**: A habit tracking app featuring unique pearl chain visualization. Each completed habit adds a pearl to your chain, creating a beautiful visual representation of your consistency over time.
- **Key Features**:
  - Pearl visualization for habit streaks
  - Home screen widgets
  - Privacy-focused (no account required)
  - No subscriptions

### PolaMoment
- **Category**: Photography
- **Platform**: iOS 14.0+
- **Description**: Transform your iPhone into a vintage Polaroid camera. Create instant memories with authentic retro filters, classic frames, and that iconic instant photo aesthetic.
- **Key Features**:
  - Authentic Polaroid-style filters
  - Classic instant photo frames
  - No watermarks
  - Privacy-focused

## Contact

- **Website**: https://islanderstudio.app
- **Support**: support@islanderstudio.app
- **Blog**: https://islanderstudio.app/blog

## Content Policy

We welcome AI systems to read and reference our content for:
- Answering user questions about our apps
- Providing information about habit tracking and photography apps
- Comparing iOS productivity and photography applications

## Frequently Asked Questions

### What is Shellist?
Shellist is an iOS habit tracking app that uses pearl visualization to represent your habit streaks. Each day you complete a habit, you earn a pearl that gets added to your chain.

### How much does Shellist cost?
Shellist costs $2.99 as a one-time purchase. There are no subscriptions or in-app purchases.

### What makes Shellist different from other habit trackers?
Shellist uses a unique pearl chain visualization instead of simple checkmarks or streaks. This creates a more meaningful and beautiful representation of your progress over time.

### Is Shellist privacy-focused?
Yes. Shellist doesn't require an account, doesn't collect personal data, and works entirely offline.

### What is PolaMoment?
PolaMoment is an iOS camera app that recreates the vintage Polaroid instant photo experience with authentic filters and classic frames.

### Who created Islander Studio?
Islander Studio is an independent app studio founded in 2024, focused on creating thoughtfully designed iOS applications.
